byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Obama administration officials deny Iranian news reports that Gholam Shakuri, man charged in plot to assassinate Saudi ambassador to United States, is part of exiled Iranian opposition group.
snippet: Obama administration officials on Wednesday denied Iranian news reports that Gholam Shakuri is an agent of Mujahedeen Khalq, a group Iran regards as a terrorist organization.
lead_paragraph: Obama administration officials on Wednesday denied Iranian news reports that Gholam Shakuri is an agent of Mujahedeen Khalq, a group Iran regards as a terrorist organization.

headline.main: U.S. Denies Iran Claims That Saudi Plot Defendant Belongs to Exile Group
headline.print_headline: U.S. Denies Iran Claims About Suspect
